item.title: CodeRag
item.description: Robert Underwood (412) 475-9741 rlu@robertlunderwood.com linkedin.com/in/robertlunderwood Postgraduate passionate about data science. Seeking to leverage and improve data analytical skills gained through education to improve business performance and drive decision making. EDUCATION AMERICAN UNIVERSITY, Washington, DC Master of Science in Analytics, June 2017 Email Marketing Data Project: Analyzed email marketing data – both company and third-party data – to build a model that could predict email responses while reducing the total emails sent by over 50%.
